StonelordArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Stonelord Paladin archetype regardless of race.

PhantasmalMageArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Phatasmal Mage Arcanist archetype regardless of race.

ReformedFiendArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Reformed Fiend Bloodrager archetype regardless of race.

CavalierOfThePawArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Cavalier of the Paw archetype regardless of race.

SpellDancerArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Spell Dancer archetype regardless of race.

StudentOfStoneArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Student of Stone archetype regardless of race.

PurifierArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Purifier archetype regardless of race.

MasterOfAllArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Master of All archetype regardless of race.

WildlandShamanArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Wildland Shaman archetype regardless of race.

ImitatorArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Imitator archetype regardless of race.

NineTailedHeirArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Nine-Tailed Heir archetype regardless of race.

CruoromancerArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Cruoromancer archetype regardless of race.

Oathbreaker.Description: Adds a modified version of the Vindictive Bastard archetype as a full class.

Dread Knight.Description: Adds the Antipaladin as a class, renamed and modified slightly to fit the campaign setting.

Stargazer.Description: Adds Stargazer as a pretige class, a follower of Pulura and master of cosmic magic.

Living Scripture.Description: A requested inquisitor archetype that focuses on divine spellcasting, buffed from tabletop to be a full caster.

Temple Champion.Description: A paladin archetype with access to domain powers at the cost of their spellcasting, slightly buffed as archetype underperforms on tabletop.

Mantis Zealot.Description: A warpriest archetype focusing on assassination and dual wielding, must worship Achaekek.

Mooncaller.Description: A druid archetype dedicated to the endless cycle of the moon.

Draconic Druid.Description: A druid archetype that gains a drake companion and the ability to wildshape into draconic forms.

Drake Warden.Description: A ranger archetype charged with raising a young drake companion.

Silver Champion.Description: A paladin of Apsu gifted with a silver drake companion and a altered spellbook.

Clutch Thief.Description: A rogue archeype combining sneak attacks and teamwork feats with a drake partner.

Ocean's Echo.Description: A oracle archeype swapping serveral revelations for limited bardic abilities.

Draconic Shaman.Description: A shaman archeype swapping sprit and some hexes for a drake companion.

Draconic Scholar.Description: A arcanist archeype trades most exploits for a drake companion and draconic exploits.

Storm Druid.Description: A druid archeype focused on spontaneous casting of domain spells

Urban Druid.Description: A druid archeype focused on spontaneous casting of domain spells

Bear Shaman.Description: A druid archeype channeling the power of the bear sprits, renamed to bear totem druid to avoid confusion.

Lion Shaman.Description: A druid archeype channeling the power of the lion sprits, renamed to lion totem druid to avoid confusion.

Draconic Companion.Description: A animal companion archeype with a faint trace of dragon blood that grants them special abilities.

Wyrm Singer.Description: A skald archeype that sings tales of the ongoing battle of Apsu and Dahak.

Archer.Description: A fighter archeype that is an archer that arches archeringly.

Scalykind Domain.Description: Adds the scalykind domain, a animal companion domain with different options the the animal domain.

Archon Subdomain.Description: Adds the archon subdomain, a subdomain to the good and law domains.

Blood Subdomain.Description: Adds the blood subdomain, a subdomain to the war domain.

Caves Subdomain.Description: Adds the caves subdomain, a subdomain to the earth domain.

Demon Subdomain.Description: Adds the deamon subdomain, a subdomain to the chaos and evil domains.

Dragon Subdomain.Description: Adds the dragon subdomain, a subdomain to the scalykind domain.

Ice Subdomain.Description: Adds the ice subdomain, a subdomain to the water domain.

Revelation Subdomain.Description: Adds the revelation subdomain, a subdomain to the sun domain.

Storm Subdomain.Description: Adds the storm subdomain, a subdomain to the weather domain.

Undead Subdomain.Description: Adds the undead subdomain, a subdomain to the death domain.

Wind Subdomain.Description: Adds the wind subdomain, a subdomain to the air domain.

Ferocity Subdomain.Description: Adds the ferocity subdomain, a subdomain to the strength domain.

Psychopomp Subdomain.Description: Adds the Psychopomp subdomain, a subdomain to the death and repose domains.

Rivers Subdomain.Description: Adds the rivers subdomain, a subdomain to the water domain.

Rage Subdomain.Description: Adds the rage subdomain, a subdomain to the destruction domain.

Thievery Subdomain.Description: Adds the thievery subdomain, a subdomain to the trickery domain.

Revolution Subdomain.Description: Adds the revolution subdomain, a subdomain to the liberation domain.

Curse Subdomain.Description: Adds the curse subdomain, a subdomain to the luck domain.

Whimsy Subdomain.Description: Adds the whimsy subdomain, a subdomain to the chaos domain.

Restoration Subdomain.Description: Adds the restoration subdomain, a subdomain to the healing domain.

Resolve Subdomain.Description: Adds the resolve subdomain, a subdomain to the strength domain.

Agathion Subdomain.Description: Adds the agathion subdomain, a subdomain to the good domain.

Lust Subdomain.Description: Adds the lust subdomain, a subdomain to the charm domain.

Fur Subdomain.Description: Adds the fur subdomain, a subdomain to the animal domain.

Defense Subdomain.Description: Adds the defense subdomain, a subdomain to the protection domain.

Heroism Subdomain.Description: Adds the heroism subdomain, a subdomain to the glory domain.

Archdevils.Description: Adds the Archdevils of hell as deity options

Deities of Ancient Osirion.Description: Adds the deities of Ancient Oririon as deity options

Deities of Tian Xia.Description: Adds the deities of Tian Xia as deity options

Demon Lords.Description: Adds the Demon Lords of the Abyss as deity options

Empyreal Lords.Description: Adds the Empyral Lords of the positive planes as deity options

Elven Pantheon.Description: Adds the deities of the Elven Pantheon as deity options

Draconic Deities.Description: Adds the Draconic Deities as deity options

The Eldest.Description: Adds the Eldest of The First World as deity options

Monitors.Description: Adds the Monitors of the neutral planes as deity options

The Elder Mythos.Description: Adds the Elder Mythos of the Dark Tapestry as deity options

Orc Pantheon.Description: Adds the deities of the Orc Pantheon as deity options

Archduke of Cheliax.Description: [Request, not tuned for balance] The highest rank of the standard nobility in Cheliax are the Archdukes.

AivuPet.Description: Allows you to select Aivu as a normal animal companion.

Aid Another.Description: Adds the Aid Another feature from the tabletop, this toggle will also disable features and feats relating to the Aid Another feature.
